title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2703/95 of 22 November 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 1489/95 setting export refunds on fruit and vegetables
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No  2703/95 of 22 November 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 1489/95 setting export refunds on fruit and  vegetables
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annexes I and II to Regulation (EC) No 1489/95 are hereby replaced by  Annexes I and II respectively to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in  the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 November 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
ANNEX I
'ANNEX I RATES AND QUANTITIES LAID DOWN FOR THE ALLOCATION OF LICENCES WITH ADVANCE FIXING OF THE REFUND >TABLE>
ANNEX II
'ANNEX II INDICATIVE RATES AND QUANTITIES LAID DOWN FOR THE ALLOCATION OF LICENCES WITHOUT ADVANCE FIXING OF  THE REFUND >TABLE>
